abstract: Following the death of Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi, women's rights activists are working with renewed energy and hope for the long slog ahead as Libya rebuilds.
snippet: Following the death of Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi, women's rights activists are working with renewed energy and hope for the long slog ahead as Libya rebuilds.

headline.main: With New Hope, Women Activists Keep Focus on Libya
